summary: Implements a dataset class that reads raw text‑normalization test files, prepares examples for text‑normalization (TN), inverse‑text‑normalization (ITN) or joint processing in a given language, and supplies utilities to calculate class‑wise and sentence‑wise accuracy during model evaluation.
business_intent: Enable reliable evaluation of text‑normalization models by providing a standardized test dataset and accuracy metrics, facilitating model benchmarking and quality assurance in speech‑to‑text and text‑to‑speech pipelines.
